en_line: The sun is shining, it's a lovely day,
zh_trans: 阳光灿烂今天天气好呀

en_line: A perfect morning for a kid to play,
zh_trans: 完美的早晨适合小孩玩

en_line: But you're got lots of bills to pay
What can you do?
Your work real hard and the pay's real low
zh_trans: 你很努力工作但工资很少

en_line: And every hour goes oh, so slow
And at the end of the day there's no where to go
zh_trans: 到了最后却发现没有去处可逃

en_line: Back home to Avenue Q
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
zh_trans: 你有没有感觉没人陪伴你

en_line: Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
zh_trans: 你有没有感到自己被遗忘在半空里

en_line: Have you ever felt like you could disappear
zh_trans: 你有没有感觉你可以消失

en_line: Like you could fall and no one would hear
Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
zh_trans: 那就让寂寞的感觉流走

en_line: Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
zh_trans: 也许有一种理由相信你会好起来

en_line: Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
zh_trans: 当你感到无法再站起来

en_line: You can reach, reach out your hand
Even when the dark comes crashing through
When you need a friend to carry you
And when you're broken on the ground
You will be found
So let the sun come streaming in
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
Lift your head and look around
You will be found
I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
zh_trans: 我不需要你推销我为何要你呢

en_line: I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
zh_trans: 我不需要你搜寻我该的证明

en_line: You don't have to convince me
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
zh_trans: 你不必惶恐你不够资格

en_line: 'Cause what we've got going is good
I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
zh_trans: 那些破碎的不再需要提醒更多

en_line: I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
zh_trans: 我不需要你帮我忘掉的过错

en_line: Clear the slate and start over
Try to quiet the noises in your head
zh_trans: 试着静下头脑里的喧嚣

en_line: We can't compete with all that
So what if it's us?
What if it's us And only us
And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
zh_trans: 以前发生的事情不再重要了吗

en_line: Can we try that?
What if it's you
And what if it's me
And what if that's all that we need it to be
zh_trans: 要是这正是我们所需要的

en_line: And the rest of the world falls away?
What do you say?
I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
zh_trans: 从来没想过会有人像你愿意拥有我

en_line: So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
zh_trans: 所以我给你一万个理由别放开我

en_line: But if you really see me
If you like me for me and nothing else
zh_trans: 若你喜欢我我却没别的

en_line: Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
zh_trans: 好吧这就是我心中渴望已久的理想了

en_line: All these blank and tranquil years
Seems they've dried up all my tears
And while she runs free and fast
Seems my wild days are past
But I miss the mountains
I miss the dizzy heights
All the manic magic days
And the dark depressing nights
I miss the mountains
I miss the highs and lows
All the climbing all the falling
All the while the wild wind blows
Stinging you with snow
And soaking you with rain
I miss the mountains
I miss the pain
Do you wake up in the morning
And need help to lift your head
Do you read obituaries
And feel jealous of the dead
It's like living on a cliffside
Not knowing when you'll dive
Do you know, Do you know
What it's like to die alive
When a world that once had color
Fades to white and grey and black
When tomorrow terrifies you
But you'll die if you look back
You don't know
I know you don't know
You say that you're hurting
It sure doesn't show
You don't know
It lays me so low
When you say let go
And I say You don't know
Whenever I see someone less fortunate than I
zh_trans: 每当我看到比我不幸运的人时

en_line: And let's face it
Who isn't less fortunate than I?
My tender heart tends to start to bleed
And when someone needs a makeover
I simply have to take over!
I know, I know exactly what they need!
zh_trans: 我知道他们需要的东西

en_line: And even in your case
Though it's the toughest case I've yet to face
zh_trans: 虽然是最艰难的一关头

en_line: Don't worry, I'm determined to succeed!
zh_trans: 别担心我一定会有成就

en_line: Follow my lead
you will be Popular!
You're gonna be popular!
I'll teach you the proper poise
When you talk to boys
Little ways to flirt and flounce
I'll show you what shoes to wear!
How to fix your hair!
Everything that really counts to be...
zh_trans: 那些真正重要的东西啊

en_line: POPULAR!
I'll help you be popular!
You'll hang with the right cohorts
You'll be good at sports
Know the slang you've got to know
So let's start
'Cause you've got an awfully long way to go!
zh_trans: 因为你有漫长的路要走啊

en_line: Don't be offended by my frank analysis
zh_trans: 不要对我的坦率分析有冒犯

en_line: Think of it as personality dialysis
zh_trans: 就当作是进行人格的透析吧

en_line: Now that I've chosen to become a Pal, a sis or an advisor
zh_trans: 既然已经选择了成为师妹或者顾问的话

en_line: There's nobody wiser!
Not when it comes to POPULAR!
I know about popular
And with an assist from me
To be who you'll be
Instead of dreary who you were...
There's nothing that can stop you From becoming popu-ler...
zh_trans: 没有什么可以阻止你成为万人迷吧

en_line: Never again will she get the best of me,
zh_trans: 再也不会成为她的玩物了

en_line: Never again will she take away my freedom,
zh_trans: 她再也不会剥夺我的自由了

en_line: And we won't forget the day we fought for the right to be a little bit naughty.
zh_trans: 我们不会忘记我们为争取一点小小的自由而战

en_line: Never again, will the chokey door slam.
zh_trans: 再不会关上牢房的门了

en_line: Never again, will I be bullied and
zh_trans: 再也不会让别人欺负我

en_line: Never again will I doubt it when my mummy says I'm a miracle.
zh_trans: 再也不会怀疑我的妈妈说我是一个奇迹了

en_line: Never again will we live behind doors
zh_trans: 再也不会在房门后生活

en_line: We are revolting children, living in revolting times
zh_trans: 我们是叛逆的孩子活在叛逆时代

en_line: We sing revolting songs, using revolting rhymes.
zh_trans: 我们唱反歌我们用反义词儿

en_line: We'll be revolting children til our revoltings done,
zh_trans: 我们会一直反抗直到我们胜利

en_line: And we'll have the Trunchbull bolting, we're REVOLTING!
zh_trans: 而特朗普将被驱逐我们起义

en_line: He got down on one knee but I said no way
zh_trans: 他跪下来但我说不可能啊

en_line: Packed my bags and moved into a nu nu nunneray
zh_trans: 我收拾好行李搬进了一个姑娘家

en_line: Joined the gospel choir, our riffs were on fire
zh_trans: 合唱团的和音一触即发

en_line: At the top of the charts is where I'm gonna stay
zh_trans: 在排行榜的顶端才是我的家

en_line: Henry sent me a poem all about my green sleeves
zh_trans: 亨利寄来一首诗写满了我的青袖

en_line: I changed a couple words put it on a sick beat
zh_trans: 我换了几个词加上了病节奏

en_line: The song blew their minds, next minute I was signed
zh_trans: 一首歌让他们疯狂签约我

en_line: And now I'm writing lyrics for Shakesy P
zh_trans: 如今却写词给沙琪柏作伴奏

en_line: Since my first son, our family's grown
We made a band and got quite well known
You could perhaps call us the Tudor Von Trapps
zh_trans: 你也许能称我们为图多夫

en_line: I'm just kidding, we're called the Royalling Stones
zh_trans: 开玩笑我们叫罗云石啊

en_line: We're one of a kind no category
zh_trans: 我们是独一无二的类型

en_line: Too many years lost in his story
We're free to take, our crowning glory
For five more minutes
We're Six
What a shame yeah my face it cost me the crown
zh_trans: 多可惜是啊我被冠冕所累

en_line: So I moved to the Haus of Holbein in my hometown
zh_trans: 于是我搬到了故乡的豪斯艺术馆

en_line: His mates were super arty, but I showed them how to party
zh_trans: 他的伙伴超级文艺但我让他们学会嗨

en_line: Now on my tour of Prussia everybody gets down
zh_trans: 现在在普鲁士巡演大家趴下来

en_line: Music man tried it on and I was like bye
zh_trans: 音乐人试了之后我就拜拜

en_line: So I thought "Who needs him?", I can give it a try
zh_trans: 于是想着谁需要我还试试看

en_line: I learned everything, Now all I do is sing
zh_trans: 我学了一切现在我只会唱

en_line: And I'll do that until I die
Heard all about these rockin' chicks
Loved every song and each remix
So I went out and found them, And we lay down an album
zh_trans: 所以我出去找他们并完成了专辑

en_line: Now I don't need your love, all I need is Six
zh_trans: 不需要你的爱我只需要六

en_line: Step out, step out of the sun
If you keep getting burned
Step out, step out of the sun
Because you've learned, because you've learned
On the outside always looking in
Will I ever be more than I've always been?
zh_trans: 我会不会超越自己一辈子

en_line: 'cause I'm tap, tap, tapping on the glass
I'm waving through a window
I try to speak, but nobody can hear
zh_trans: 我试着说话却没人听我

en_line: So I wait around for an answer to appear
zh_trans: 于是我在周围等待答案出现

en_line: While I'm watch, watch, watching people pass
I'm waving through a window
Oh, can anybody see,
is anybody waving back at me?
zh_trans: 有没有人向我挥着手呢

en_line: We start with stars in our eyes
We start believing that we belong
But every sun doesn't rise
And no one tells you where you went wrong
When you're falling in a forest
and there's nobody around
Do you ever really crash,
or even make a sound
Hear me now, O thou bleak and unbearable world
zh_trans: 听见吧这无望的世界听我说

en_line: Thou art base, and debauched as can be
And a knight, with his banners all bravely unfurled
zh_trans: 骑士们旗帜也勇敢地飘扬着

en_line: Now hurls down his gauntlet to thee
I am I, Don Quixote, the Lord of La Mancha
zh_trans: 我是堂吉诃德马那查省的领主

en_line: My destiny calls and I go
And the wild winds of fortune, will carry me onward
zh_trans: 狂野的幸运之风将我带向远方

en_line: Oh whithersoever they blow
Whithersoever they blow, onward to glory I go
zh_trans: 不管它我将去追求我的荣耀之路

en_line: Hear me heathens and wizards and serpents of sin
zh_trans: 听吧异教徒巫师和罪恶之蛇

en_line: All your dastardly doings are past
For a holy endeavor is now to begin
zh_trans: 神圣的事业现在就要开始了

en_line: And virtue shall triumph at last
The snow glows white on the mountain tonight, Not a footprint, to be seen
zh_trans: 今晚山上的雪白得耀眼不留下一缕足印

en_line: A kingdom of isolation, and it looks like I'm the Queen
zh_trans: 一个被孤立的王国而我似是那女皇

en_line: The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside
zh_trans: 风在咆哮像这卷起的风暴里

en_line: Couldn't keep it in, heaven knows I've tried
zh_trans: 曾努力过但无法再保持

en_line: Don't let them in, don't let them see
Be the good girl, You always have to be
zh_trans: 做那个乖巧的女孩子吧

en_line: Conceal don't feel
Don't let them know
Well now they know
Let it go
Let it go
Can't hold it back anymore
I don't care
What they're going to say
Let the storm rage on
The cold never bother me anyway
zh_trans: 反正寒冷也从不打扰我

en_line: My power flurries through the air into the ground
zh_trans: 我的力量呼啸而过划破长空

en_line: My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around
zh_trans: 我的灵魂在冰冻的分形中盘旋着

en_line: And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast
zh_trans: 一个念头就冰冻般地结晶了

en_line: The window is open so’s that door
I didn’t know they did that anymore
Who knew we owned eight thousands salad plates?
zh_trans: 谁知家中有八千个盘子

en_line: For years I’ve roamed these empty halls
Why have a ballroom with no balls?
Finally they’re opening up the gates
There’ll be actual real live people
It’ll be totally strange
But wow am I so ready for this change
zh_trans: 但我哇我完全准备好了

en_line: Cuz for the first time in forever
There’ll be music, there’ll be light
For the first time in forever
I’ll be dancing through the night
Don’t know if I’m elated or gassy
zh_trans: 不知道我激动还是晕眩

en_line: But I’m somewhere in that zone
Cuz for the first time in forever
I won’t be alone
For the first time in forever
I’m getting what I’m dreaming of
A chance to change my lonely world
A chance to find true love
Don’t let them in, don’t let them see
Be the good girl you always have to be
zh_trans: 做你永远的好姑娘好吗

en_line: Conceal
Conceal don’t feel don’t let them know
I know it all ends tomorrow,
So it has to be today
Cuz for the first time in forever
For the first time in forever
Nothing’s  in my way!
You wait, little girl, on an empty stage,
zh_trans: 你在空的舞台上等待着

en_line: For fate to turn the light on
Your life, little girl, is an empty page,
zh_trans: 姑娘你的人生是空白页

en_line: That men will want to write on
You are sixteen going on seventeen
Baby, it's time to think
Better beware, be canny and careful
zh_trans: 最好小心翼翼聪明周到

en_line: Baby, you're on the brink
You are sixteen going on seventeen
Fellows will fall in line
Eager young lads and rogues and cads
Will offer you food and wine
Totally unprepared are you
To face a world of men
Timid and shy and scared are you
Of things beyond your ken
To dream the impossible dream,
To fight the unbeatable foe,
To bear with unbearable sorrow
To run where the brave dare not go;
To right the unrightable wrong.
To love, pure and chaste, from afar,
To try, when your arms are too weary,
To reach the unreachable star!
This is my Quest to follow that star,
No matter how hopeless, no matter how far,
zh_trans: 无论多绝望无论多远路途

en_line: To fight for the right
Without question or pause,
To be willing to march into hell
For a heavenly cause!
And I know, if I'll only be true
To this glorious Quest,
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest.
And the world will be better for this,
That one man, scorned and covered with scars,
Still strove, with his last ounce of courage,
To reach the unreachable stars!
And I got my first job flying for a mortician
zh_trans: 我第一次工作是为一名殡仪师

en_line: in a tiny bonanza, just a corpse and me
zh_trans: 在小小的富矿只有我和尸体

en_line: Five dollars an hour for flying dead bodies
I had to climb over their faces just to get to my seat
zh_trans: 我只好爬过他们的脸才走到我位子

en_line: And suddenly the wheels lift off
the ground is falling backwards
I am suddenly alive
Suddenly I'm in the cockpit
Suddenly everything's changed
Suddenly I'm not too young or too short
zh_trans: 忽然间不年轻也不矮了

en_line: and the passengers in the back don't complain
zh_trans: 而后排的乘客从不抱怨过

en_line: Suddenly I'm flying company charters
zh_trans: 突然间我开始飞行包机了

en_line: Suddenly everything's high
Suddenly there's nothing in between me and the sky
zh_trans: 突然之间隔着一片空无一人的

en_line: Welcome to the show to the historemix
zh_trans: 欢迎收看本期历史混搭剧

en_line: Switching up the flow as we add the prefix
zh_trans: 切换风格随着前缀的加入

en_line: Everybody knows that we used to be six wives
zh_trans: 谁都知道我们曾经是六妻一夫

en_line: Raising up the roof till we hit the ceiling
zh_trans: 把屋顶推到天花板上为止

en_line: Get ready for the truth that we'll be revealing
zh_trans: 准备好我们会揭露的真相

en_line: Everybody knows that we used to be six wives
zh_trans: 人人都知道我们曾是六妻

en_line: But now we're Ex-wives.
All you ever hear and read about
Is our ex, and the way it ended
But a pair doesn't beat a royal flush
zh_trans: 但一对不等于万能绝配

en_line: You're gonna find out how we got unfriended
zh_trans: 你会发现我们怎么被拉黑

en_line: Tonight, we're gonna do ourselves justice,
zh_trans: 今晚我们来伸张正义吧

en_line: cause we're taking you to court
And every Tudor rose has it's thorns
and you're gonna hear them live in consort.
zh_trans: 并能亲耳聆听它们对话

en_line: In sleep he sang to me
In dreams he came
That voice which calls to me
And speaks my name
And do I dream again
For now I find
The phantom of the opera is there
zh_trans: 歌剧院幽灵在那里徘徊

en_line: Inside my mind
Sing once again with me
Our strange duet
My power over you
Grows stronger yet
When I grow up,
I will be brave enough to fight the creatures
zh_trans: 我会勇敢的和怪物战斗

en_line: That you have to fight beneath the bed each night to be a grown up.
zh_trans: 每晚睡前都要在床底下和怪兽们战斗

en_line: Just because you find that life's not fair,
zh_trans: 只因为你发现人生不公

en_line: it doesn't mean that you just have to grin and bear it!
zh_trans: 并不代表你要强忍到底

en_line: If you always take it on the chin and wear it
zh_trans: 如果总是忍气吞声默默承受

en_line: Nothing will change.
Just because I find myself in this story,
zh_trans: 只因故事中找到自己的我

en_line: It doesn't mean that everything is written for me.
zh_trans: 一切并不代表都为我写的

en_line: If I think the ending is fixed already,
zh_trans: 如果我觉得结局早被定了

en_line: I might as well be saying
I think that it's OK,
And that's not right!
In the eye of a hurricane
there is quiet
For just a moment
A yellow sky
When I was seventeen a hurricane
zh_trans: 十七岁那年一场飓风里

en_line: destroyed my town
I didn’t drown
I couldn’t seem to die
I wrote my way out
Wrote everything down far as I could see
zh_trans: 写下了所有我能看见的

en_line: I wrote my way out
I looked up and the town had its eyes on me
zh_trans: 我抬头看小镇目光注视我

en_line: They passed a plate around
Total strangers
Moved to kindness by my story
Raised enough for me to book passage on a
zh_trans: 多得给我足够订票的银子

en_line: Ship that was New York bound…
I wrote my way out of hell
I wrote my way to revolution
I was louder than the crack in the bell
zh_trans: 我的声音比钟声更响亮

en_line: I wrote Eliza love letters until she fell
zh_trans: 我写给艾丽莎的情书到天黑

en_line: I wrote about The Constitution and defended it well
zh_trans: 我写了一篇关于宪法并好好捍卫它

en_line: And in the face of ignorance and resistance
zh_trans: 也面对着无知的阻挠和抗拒

en_line: I wrote financial systems into existence
zh_trans: 我把金融系统写成了存在物

en_line: And when my prayers to God were met with indifference
zh_trans: 当我的祈祷遇到上帝的冷漠时

en_line: I picked up a pen, I wrote my own deliverance
zh_trans: 我拿起笔写下自己的救赎之路

en_line: My grandfather was a fire and brimstone preacher
zh_trans: 我的祖父是火和硫磺的牧师

en_line: But there are things that the Homilies and hymns won't teach ya
zh_trans: 但有些事传道授业传艺无法教会

en_line: My mother was a genius
My father commanded respect
When they died they left no instructions
Just a legacy to protect
Death doesn’t discriminate
Between the sinners and the saints
It takes and it takes and it takes
And we keep living anyway
We rise and we fall And we break
And we make our mistakes
And if there’s a reason I’m still alive
zh_trans: 若有一个理由让我活下来

en_line: When everyone who loves me has died
I’m willing to wait for it
I’m willing to wait for it
Wait for it
I am the one thing in life I can control
zh_trans: 我是生命中唯一能掌控的

en_line: I am inimitable
I am an original
I’m not falling behind or running late
zh_trans: 我没有落后没有迟到了

en_line: I’m not standing still
I am lying in wait
Hamilton faces an endless uphill climb
zh_trans: 汉密尔顿面对无尽的爬坡

en_line: He has something to prove
He has nothing to lose
Hamilton’s pace is relentless
He wastes no time
What is it like in his shoes?
